intro.title: Make a Difference Today
intro.description: Every contribution, no matter the size, helps us create lasting change. Your support enables us to provide education, microloans, and sustainable development initiatives to those who need it most.

taxInfo.description: Roberto Save Dreams Foundation is a registered non-profit organization. Donations are tax-deductible in many countries, including:

options.description: Many employers match charitable donations made by their employees. Check with your HR department to see if your company has a matching gift program.

transparency.title: Financial Transparency
transparency.description: We are committed to financial transparency and accountability. Approximately 85% of all donations go directly to our programs, with the remaining 15% covering essential administrative and fundraising costs.

testimonial.quote: I donate monthly because I've seen firsthand how the foundation transforms lives. My contribution is an investment in a better future for Africa.
testimonial.author: James Wilson

questions.question: Is my donation secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal and payment information. We are PCI compliant and never store your full credit card details.

questions.question: Can I change or cancel my recurring donation?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your recurring donation at any time by logging into your donor account or contacting our donor services team at donations@robertosavedreams.org.

questions.question: Will I receive a receipt for my donation?
questions.answer: Yes, you will receive an email receipt immediately after your donation is processed. For recurring donations, you will receive a consolidated receipt at the end of the year for tax purposes.

questions.question: Can I specify which program my donation supports?
questions.answer: Yes, you can designate your donation to support a specific program area: Education, Microloans, or Sustainable Development. You can also choose 'Where Needed Most' to allow us to direct your donation to the areas of greatest need.
